thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com
thread.title: eliran8s

author: eliran8s
title: eliran8s
text:
I am working with TopCashBack in the last 2 years and I can only say good things about this cashback website.
It provides increased cash back amounts comparing to other cashback websites.
The customer service is decent and replies within 1-2 business days.
And the most important thing for me is that unlike other cashback websites, The cashback tracking works great (From over 100 transactions I made, only a few of them weren't tracked, and I have received their cash back manually, after contacting TopCashBack and providing them all the info regarding these transactions).
